column5: Got out yesterday for some perchin, it was dang cold, but the fish ate pretty much anything we had to offer them....  Nothing huge, but we each got about a dozen keepers, could have been more, but we were picky, waiting for the jumbos that never came.   A strange surprise on the walk out, I guess this girl went on a little bit too early, and the coyotes found her   A shot at the end of the day.
looks u guys had a great day,  damn those coyotes tore that thing apart
Great catch guys   considering the storm comming !!! nice pic as well,and man those cyotes were sure hungry ??....cheers
thanks guys, we fished 10-11 feet of water all day
im jealous 2 more days to go congrats
Just wondering guys...what was the ice thickness at duclos point ??????....i know itjs safe enough to walk on but my bud wants to put his hut there very soon !!!!  thanks in advance...cheers
Me too won't be on the ice until the 29th.thanks for the report
WTG Steve, nice mess of perch!
never saw less than 4 inches, saw as much as 8 inches
that being said, there is still open water, stay away from it.  There were ATV's out there, but I wouldnt recommend it, ice thickness fluctuated greatly
It was nice meeting you out there steve, a fun day for sure. A few more jumbos would have been really nice though.
Great report thanks for the ICE update.
for sure buddy, we'll do it again, i just gotta get me one of them portable huts.
